name: My Succubus Girlfriend
summary:
因为外貌，我始终找不到朋友和女朋友...

Izumo is a scary-looking elite student. Everyone is afraid of him, but in reality, he just wants fun friends and a cute girlfriend. One day a succubus named Anastasia visits him to try and steal his virginity.
--- Art by Yoshitaka Maki --- Story by R. Merryweather
info:
• 中文名: 我的魅魔女友
  • 连载杂志: LINE WEBTOON
  • 作者: Merryweather
  • 作画: Yoshitaka Maki
  • 连载开始: 2017-10-02
